text: Hi there. How are you today?
I'm well, thanks for asking.
Did you know you can donate some or all of your earnings to Save the Children today?
I did think that may be possible.   Can you tell me more about Save the Children?
It is an organization that helps kids in other countries who may not have food and water. I can hardly imagine what that would be like. I am blessed to have 3 healthy children here in America.
That's great!  Every child should have the same opportunities in life, but unfortunately that doesn't happen.  What are some of the things Save the Children does to help?
They make sure these kids have clean water to drink as well as food and they have access to medical care.
Nice.   Are they the ones that make those commercials?  The ones that show kids in bad situations?  That commercial makes me so sad!

Yes they are. They make me sad to. But also reminds me how much I have and how blessed I am. I have so much more then they do. I would want to help them out. Even just a few cents would help them. Don't your think?
Me too.  Yes, I think it's a great cause.  I like to think that if a bunch of people give just a little, it can add up to do a lot of good.  I can give $0.05, and hopefully more in the future.
Awesome! Thank you for helping them. I will be doing the same thing.
Great!   Thanks for advocating.  I hope you have a great day!
Have a wonderful day.
We need 10 turns, so here it is.  Thanks for your time.
Okay. It was fun chatting with you!
you too.  I think it's interesting and creative for them to be doing this on mturk, don't you think?
Yes I do. How long have you been doing mturk?
I did it a bunch in 2014 when I was unemployed.  I'm doing it now because I'm broke until I get my first paycheck from a new job I'm starting tomorrow.   You?
I do it when I'm bored. And I put the money away for vacation or retirement. I enjoy it.
I don't enjoy it that much, only out of necessity.  That's quite responsible of you!
